descriptionlist.description:
If you have CyberKit MobileMiniBrowser installed, you should uninstall that first.
Installing this package causes jetsam to magically configure on your device.
Then, you can remove this package as soon as it installs.

changelog.change: Updated WebKit from 7616.1.7 branch to 7616.1.12 branch
Bundle internationalization instead of using potentially older system data, and other iOS 12 work
